verses.text: \w And|strong="H0935"\w* David \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Nobe \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Achimelech \w the|strong="H0935"\w* priest: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Achimelech \w was|strong="H3083"\w* astonished \w at|strong="H0935"\w* David’s \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* said \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*: Why art thou alone, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* no man \w with|strong="H0935"\w* thee?

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Achimelech \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* king hath \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* business, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Let \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* thing \w for|strong="H0413"\w* which thou art \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* what manner \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w commands|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* given thee: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* appointed \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* such \w and|strong="H0935"\w* such \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w place|strong="H0935"\w*.

Now \w therefore|strong="H3045"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* hand, though \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w but|strong="H0376"\w* five loaves, \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w or|strong="H0408"\w* whatsoever thou canst \w find|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest answered \w David|strong="H3027"\w*, saying: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* common \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w at|strong="H4672"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H6258"\w* only holy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w if|strong="H0176"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* young men \w be|strong="H3027"\w* clean, especially \w from|strong="H3027"\w* women?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* concerneth \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* refrained ourselves \w from|strong="H3027"\w* yesterday \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day \w before|strong="H0413"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H0802"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*. \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* way \w is|strong="H0369"\w* defiled, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* sanctified \w this|strong="H3588"\w* day \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vessels.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6030"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* hallowed bread: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* bread \w there|strong="H1961"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* loaves \w of|strong="H3117"\w* proposition, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* face \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hot loaves might \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H6942"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* certain man \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w within|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* Doeg, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* Edomite, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* chiefest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Saul’s herdsmen.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Achimelech: Hast thou \w here|strong="H8033"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w a|strong="H0834"\w* spear, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* sword? \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* brought \w not|strong="H6113"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* sword, nor \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* weapons \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king’s business required haste.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* priest \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Lo, \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Goliath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Philistine whom thou slewest \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* valley \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Terebinth, wrapped \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* cloth behind \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ephod: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H6311"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*, \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* arose \w and|strong="H3548"\w* fled \w that|strong="H0834"\w* day \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* face \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w Saul|strong="H0559"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Achis \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king \w of|strong="H6010"\w* Geth:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* servants \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achis, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* saw \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*? \w Did|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* sing \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* dances, saying: \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* hath slain \w his|strong="H1732"\w* thousands, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* ten thousands?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* laid \w up|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* words \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* exceedingly afraid \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* face \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Achis \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Geth.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* changed \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* slipt \w down|strong="H6440"\w* between \w their|strong="H7760"\w* hands: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* stumbled \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* doors \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* gate, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* spittle ran \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* beard.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Achis \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servants: \w You|strong="H5921"\w* saw \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H8179"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* mad: why \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w Have|strong="H0376"\w* \w we|strong="H7200"\w* \w need|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w madmen|strong="H7696"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w fellow|strong="H0376"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* play \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w madman|strong="H7696"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* presence? \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w fellow|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* house?
